name: bartlett
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of pear (= a sweet fruit that has a round base and is slightly pointed towards the stem): He dragged in a canvas sack that was stuffed full of Bartletts. On Sundays we always had roast chicken followed by Bartlett pears.
More examplesFewer examplesMost of the Bartletts that are produced in the United States come from California.To finish the meal she produced an exquisite tart made with Bartlett pears.Anjous and Bartletts are both good pears for serving with cheese.
